name: S3WebsiteConfigurationProperty
description: WebsiteConfiguration is an embedded property of the AWS::S3::Bucket resource.

properties.name: ErrorDocument
properties.desc: The name of the error document for the website.

properties.name: IndexDocument
properties.desc: The name of the index document for the website.

properties.name: RedirectAllRequestsTo
properties.desc: The redirect behavior for every request to this bucket's website endpoint.
properties.type: Amazon S3 Website Configuration Redirect All Requests To Property

properties.name: RoutingRules
properties.desc: Rules that define when a redirect is applied and the redirect behavior.
properties.type: List of Amazon S3 Website Configuration Routing Rules Property
